page.title: 16ATTITUDES CONTINUED.
page.content: When some Lythamers were asked for their views they said they did not like the untidiness.They criticised the shops and the frontages.Most people moved to Lytham through choice ,though criticising the amenities.They thought the Beach should be cleared up by the Council.The elderly were concerned about the lack of entertainment for the young.Everyone wanted the large Leisure complex which failed to open.Concern was expressed about the roads the pavements and the fouling by dogs.Most people thought the shopping facilities were adequate. The general answer to local entertainment was "WHAT ENTERTAINMENT" The survey suggested that Lytham has changed for the worse over the last 20 years.Most people liked the quietness and the warm atmosphere of the inhabitants.
